task.title: Opening Procedure
task.shortdesc: The opening procedure for morning staff of Four Seasons Restaurant.

context.p: This is a general outline of the opening procedure. It will not cover all instances. Sometimes, things will change. If there any issues please refer to the Emergency Contact section.

step.cmd: Park your car behind the restaurant, in the employee-designated area.
Enter the restaurant via the back door. The front door should remain locked until the restaurant is officially open.
Use the provided code to open the lockbox on the fence to the left of the back door.
Take the key from the lockbox and use it to open the back door.

substep.cmd: Return the key to the lockbox after the door is unlocked.

step.cmd: Enter the back area and begin getting things squared away.

substep.cmd: It is OK to keep the back door unlocked until the restaurant has opened. Once the restaurant is opened, the back door should be used for deliveries only.

step.cmd: Verify that the kitchen is prepped for the day ahead.

substep.cmd: Confirm that the cleaning procedures from the night before were followed. If they were not, tidy up as necessary.
Confirm that the necessary food prep has been done. If it was not, prep the necessary food items.

step.cmd: Confirm that the food equipment is in working order.

substep.cmd: Ensure all burners on the stove are lit.
Ensure there is ample cooking oil in the fryer. Set internal temperature of the fryers to 300 degrees.
Verify that all pans and dishes are present. An empty hook or slot means something is missing.
substep.info: Check dishwasher area for missing items. Dirty items will need to be cleaned before use.

step.cmd: Verify that the front area is ready to receive customers.

substep.cmd: Confirm that the cleaning procedures from the night before were followed. If they were not, tidy up as necessary.
Give each table a once-over with a cleaning cloth and Natural A solution. Allow the solution to air-dry and then lightly rinse each table.
Arrange table decorations after the rinse has air-dryed.
Turn on the cash register and run the "Program Start" process outlined in the help sheet in the drawer below the register.

step.cmd: After you have confirmed that the front and back areas are ready for the day ahead, begin the necessary food prep.
step.info: The prep list should be posted on the bulletin board within dry storage.

step.cmd: Ten minutes before opening (usually 8:00 AM), turn on the front signs and turn on the lights for the front area.

substep.cmd: At 8:00 AM, unlock the front doors and begin receiving customers.
